sentences.english: Technical onrush always is billow forward, vast and mighty, cannot hold back.
sentences.chinese: 技術洪流總是滾滾向前，浩浩蕩蕩，無法阻擋。

sentences.english: Standing beside the mighty river, I am very thrilled.
sentences.chinese: 我站在浩浩的江水旁，心潮澎湃。

sentences.english: Singing and shouting slogans, the parade moved across the square like a flood.
sentences.chinese: 遊行隊伍唱着歌，呼着口號，浩浩蕩蕩穿過廣場。

sentences.english: Leading that grand armada were the minesweepers.
sentences.chinese: 這支浩浩蕩蕩艦隊的先鋒是掃雷艦。

sentences.english: The army ants are on the move.
sentences.chinese: 螞蟻大軍浩浩蕩蕩的出發了。

sentences.english: Who gave me the name of May, to go forward with great strength and vigour of a ceramic rhyme?
sentences.chinese: 是誰賦予我五月的名義，趕赴一場浩浩蕩蕩的瓷韻？

sentences.english: The trickle once stopped roaring, the vast sea stopped breathing.
sentences.chinese: 涓涓細流一旦停止了喧譁，浩浩大海也就終止了呼吸。

sentences.english: They were marching in an apparently endless line past the Great White Throne.
sentences.chinese: 他們排成浩浩蕩蕩的隊伍，整齊經過白色大寶座。

sentences.english: The mighty motorcade headed for Beijing Airport.
sentences.chinese: 車隊浩浩蕩蕩地向北京機場進發。

sentences.english: In 1649, the great Puritan Revolution reached an unspeakable climax.
sentences.chinese: 649年，浩浩蕩蕩的清教徒革命達到了高潮。

sentences.english: Surging into the spokane valley the waters headed west.
sentences.chinese: 浩浩蕩蕩地湧人斯博坎峽谷後，洪水向西行進。

sentences.english: Drive onto to dress a nose vastly and mightily.
A great range of cheeses fall into this category.
sentences.chinese: 這個門類下的乳酪大軍可謂浩浩蕩蕩。

sentences.english: Singing and shouting the slogan, the parade strided across the square like a flood.
sentences.chinese: 遊行隊伍唱着歌，喊着口號，浩浩蕩蕩穿過廣場。

definition: vast and mighty (of river or ocean)/broad and powerful
big pile of rocks/bighearted/open and honest
Hào Rán (1932-2008), journalist and proletarian novelist
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
